description.value:
You can divide your attention three ways when hunting. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hunt Prey], you can designate three creatures as prey, designate two creatures as prey and share the effect with one ally (as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Shared Prey]), or designate one creature as prey and share the effect with two allies.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision]
